measured_by: proportion of risky choices in the Decisions-from-Description task
justification: "In every regression, the outcome variable was whether or not the participant chose the risky option (risky choice was coded as 1 and safe choice was coded as 0)."

measured_by: proportion of risky choices in the Decisions-from-Experience task
justification: "To understand choices in the experience format, we ran a series of glmer models similar to those in description… the outcome variable was whether or not the participant chose the risky option."

measured_by: choice pattern across problems that vary rare-outcome favorability in the decision-making task
justification: "Studies can test for rare-weighting biases by comparing participants' choices across a set of problems that vary systematically as a function of rare-outcome favorability."

measured_by: difference in risk taking between loss-valence and gain-valence decision problems
justification: "Participants also took more risks in loss problems relative to gain problems … evidence for loss aversion."

measured_by: effect of EV difference (risky minus safe) on choice in the decision task
justification: "Participants took more risks when the risky option had a higher EV than the safe option (b=0.16, OR=1.17, p=.002)."

measured_by: eye-tracking indices (proportion of looking time and last fixation on an option)
justification: "We indeed found evidence for a gaze bias, with a larger proportion of gaze time at the risky option predicting risky choice… the last item fixated prior to choice was also more likely to be chosen."

measured_by: percent change in pupil diameter during the last third of each description trial
justification: "We measured the percent change from baseline diameter in the last 1/3 of the trial…the variable was used as a predictor in glmer models."

measured_by: number of samples taken before making a choice in the experience task
justification: "The number of samples taken before making a choice is thought to reflect a participant's attitude towards uncertainty, with less searching reflecting a greater uncertainty tolerance."

measured_by: performance on the separate Probability Estimation task after sampling
justification: "As a validity check on participants' ability to form outcome probability estimates from experience sampling, participants completed a probability estimation task."
